title: adultcrypto
author: adultcrypto
content: My people my people, I say make I bring this topic here make we reason am well. Recently, I notice say some senior men them don put eye for this our local board and their expectations go dey very high. E no good make we fall their hands at all. Recently, I don dey observe random posting and even repeating of topic wey them don discuss before from especially our new colleagues them... this one no show saw we dey organized. Raising a topic no be bad thing but make we try bring up topic them wey go make sense to discuss wey even outsiders wey dey watch us go know say we be Naija and say wey dey try. Even when we wan put mouth for talk wey dey the forum, make we try flow into the discussion in a way wey e go make sense well. I dey always dey proud of my people and I no want make that change anytime soon. So, I dey suggest make we do our best to maintain our enviable image of strong, intelligent and hardworking people.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Quote from: adultcrypto on October 05, 2023, 03:32:19 PMRecently, I don dey observe random posting and even repeating of topic wey them don discuss before from especially our new colleagues them. This wan you yarn here I say make I emphasize small. We don see threads like this wey dey encourage us to do our best, no loose guard and all that, so e no go make sense make you bring up something like this again. Continuous threads like this nai dey litter forum. E no mean weda the heading change form, but if the body dey hammer on the same tin you no come dey different from the people you dey try call out. Somebody tell me say when you see threads like dis waka pass, and I bin wan do same when I notice this tin you dey do. Biko help keep this space clean and e go dey nice if you lock this thread.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Na better matter you just yarn so my guy, and base on past board records, it clearly shows say we dey really try for the forum, because as of recently I was opportuned to see that Naija is among the top most active local board on this forum, which all that wouldn't have been possible without people like you and me always sacrificing time to ensure we drop one or two helpful post for this our local board. But however, the campaign a person joins, also dey among the reasons why some people hardly post for here, which though they may not have love to ignore here, but they are forced to do so by virtue of their campaigns. So on that note, I will also like to join you choke mouth for this matter to help encourage others not to forget our local board, because if you don't come to make here active, I don't think it's angels from heaven that will come do that for you. So thank you, as we strive to make our county proud.

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: Quote from: adultcrypto on October 05, 2023, 03:32:19 PMMy people my people, I say make I bring this topic here make we reason am well. Recently, I notice say some senior men them don put eye for this our local board and their expectations go dey very high. E no good make we fall their hands at all. Na true you talk nigga, make I no lie e don tey wey me too they reason am say some snr men they enter our local board to observe somethings and that is why you go see say even hugeblack now wey they help us run merits stuffs na wetin motivate am bedat, but unfortunately some people no too they reason am like that and na wetin we suppose they check make they bring better discussions so that anybody wey come see wetin we they do go value our LB wella. And again those snr men wey they come seriously them they expect much from us as you talk SM na true them expect us make we they talk about wetin this forum is made for no be all this news wey we they bring anytime e no help us oh, make I know. And that one no be good contribution bedat, so make we appropriate thing make we Sha see our LB for top boards of this forum.QuoteRecently, I don dey observe random posting and even repeating of topic wey them don discuss before from especially our new colleagues them... this one no show saw we dey organized. Raising a topic no be bad thing but make we try bring up topic them wey go make sense to discuss wey even outsiders wey dey watch us go know say we be Naija and say wey dey try. Even when we wan put mouth for talk wey dey the forum, make we try flow into the discussion in a way wey e go make sense well. Na true oh, we they create threads wey no they meaningful and unhelpful and most us they do something’s no be say them no know ooh, they no but they still they do am which is bad, so make we they reason wetin we post for here to more value to our LB in the future because we no go talk say na only is they enter this LB, e fur be say na only naija people they post oh, but e fit happen no be only naija people they view am so make we they bring wetin go help us grow for this forum and wetin go add more value to the LB, we no geh anything if we they create threads wey no get use, so make we they reason wetin we go bring that will benefit other people na him be d main thing.

comments.author: Roseline492
comments.body: Na true you they han ooh, this our local board don improve well well for active ness unlike before way people no they too like chart for this our local board, also I they comment on our oga them way done really put a big effort so that everybody go they carried along, so make we try they make better post because e they very bad way be say one topic go appear more than two times for one local board e no make sense na, e go they somehow say other local board go come our local board to come see the way we they roll, e come hapen say the first tree topics way him see na the same topic, so I no say everybody way they here they try but make we put more effort on the topics way we they bring because even if say here na local board no mean say na everything we go talk about here because this forum be like marketplace were all the information and post they for everybody to see.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on October 05, 2023, 03:51:29 PMQuote from: adultcrypto on October 05, 2023, 03:32:19 PMRecently, I don dey observe random posting and even repeating of topic wey them don discuss before from especially our new colleagues them. This wan you yarn here I say make I emphasize small. We don see threads like this wey dey encourage us to do our best, no loose guard and all that, so e no go make sense make you bring up something like this again. Continuous threads like this nai dey litter forum. E no mean weda the heading change form, but if the body dey hammer on the same tin you no come dey different from the people you dey try call out. Somebody tell me say when you see threads like dis waka pass, and I bin wan do same when I notice this tin you dey do. Biko help keep this space clean and e go dey nice if you lock this thread.Me I no really see anything wrong for the post... the OP put the post in a way to address the attention wey our local board don dey get for the forum, I no sure say anybody don post something wey emphasize that direction, if you see, no hesitate to share for me. Make we no over flog the issue sha,  I understand wetin the OP dey try talk and that na make we no loose guard like you put am. Make we try show the world say we too get better gist for our board. Abi e no go sweet if oyibo start to learn our pidgin because of the vibes wey them see for here?

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: adultcrypto on October 05, 2023, 03:32:19 PMRecently, I don dey observe random posting and even repeating of topic wey them don discuss before from especially our new colleagues them... this one no show saw we dey organized. Raising a topic no be bad thing but make we try bring up topic them wey go make sense to discuss wey even outsiders wey dey watch us go know say we be Naija and say wey dey try. Even when we wan put mouth for talk wey dey the forum, make we try flow into the discussion in a way wey e go make sense well. I de also notice this things this days, our fellow new colleagues they try wella but the way them they create threads wey sometimes no de relevant and sometimes repeated topics that have been created is becoming much, and similar thread to this your thread has been created before here and it is part of the rules guidelines wey de here but most of them they omit all these rules just to make sure they also create thread which is not necessary.Sometime, good comment do attract merit and attention, but since Hugeblack start supporting local boards unmerited posts that was when all these frequent thread creation start; nevertheless, it is a good thing since the local board is becoming more interesting and people are becoming more active, but we need to keep our standard and make quality posts that will make us proud in the forum at large because our senior men them are trying to bring anything good to the forum. QuoteI dey always dey proud of my people and I no want make that change anytime soon. So, I dey suggest make we do our best to maintain our enviable image of strong, intelligent and hardworking people. We Nigerians they very active in the forum because we de almost all sections of the forum just to contribute and keep the forum reputation, and statistics is showing that we are doing very well in the forum, therefore, lets keep our local board clean and lively with quality and important threads that everyone in the forum can benefit from.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: adultcrypto on October 05, 2023, 03:32:19 PMMy people my people, I say make I bring this topic here make we reason am well. Recently, I notice say some senior men them don put eye for this our local board and their expectations go dey very high. E no good make we fall their hands at all. Na true you yan, our local board dey try no be small and we dey grow in numbers and activities. E for no dey possible without the efforts of our our senior men dem and we get them to thank. But in every big family, there's always a black sheep, and like dis we get people wey no dey like adhere to simple instructions, we go do our best to dey carry everybody along. Quote from: Majestic-milf on October 05, 2023, 03:51:29 PMSomebody tell me say when you see threads like dis waka pass, and I bin wan do same when I notice this tin you dey do. Biko help keep this space clean and e go dey nice if you lock this thread.Bro... I no see anything bad about the topic, na just a call to order say even with the progress, we fit still do better and I dey happy say e dey come from a new member.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: N true matter o as e get one saying wey say the two hands dey watch each other, e dey very important for us to work together as one people regardless of our tribes, languages or ethnic groups as we need one another to move to a new phase of life.Anybody wey see wetin no gel for this forum make dem open up they tell us because all if us dey head to learn nobody be Ireland of knowledge so by doing this we gonna help each other grow in this forum if you see wetin person dey do we no dey nice just call the person in other politely no be by abusing or using offensive words on the person.

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: Quote from: adultcrypto on October 05, 2023, 03:32:19 PMMy people my people, I say make I bring this topic here make we reason am well. Recently, I notice say some senior men them don put eye for this our local board and their expectations go dey very high. E no good make we fall their hands at all. To follow you on this appreciation. I also dey very happy wirh the way plenty of our ogas them put attention for this our local board and how things have been improving over the few months wey I don join this board. E dey give me joy on top of the rapid development wey we dey get. I one twaile for them bosses for each single efforts wey dem dey put to make here look attractive and I dey still follow encourage them make them no tire with us.QuoteRecently, I don dey observe random posting and even repeating of topic wey them don discuss before from especially our new colleagues them... this one no show saw we dey organized. Raising a topic no be bad thing but make we try bring up topic them wey go make sense to discuss wey even outsiders wey dey watch us go know say we be Naija and say wey dey try. Even when we wan put mouth for talk wey dey the forum, make we try flow into the discussion in a way wey e go make sense well. This matter wey you talk so, e legit well, well, especially amongst our newbies and junior members wey dey here. True true we dey all appreciate our collective efforts to they make here dey lively but content dey say, is king  and we will be well appreciated by the level of quality contents wey we create con develop for here. Na why we dey all dey encouraged to create quality posts. Make e no be like say you dey create topic in the name.of creating topic, but to address plenty real matters wey dey sup for the country. Secondly, make e address the issues wey people dey face over these digital currencies like Bitcoin as e dey relate with our own country peculiarities. Na on thid ground sef them oga sirs fit hail you with something. Not by spamming or creating redundant topics.QuoteI dey always dey proud of my people and I no want make that change anytime soon. So, I dey suggest make we do our best to maintain our enviable image of strong, intelligent and hardworking people. Lastly, na advise. make we all continue to they work very hard and positively for this country and outside. As country don hot now, na so e hot virtually everywhere else, so na only wey we no give up on the grind we fit they happy with our daily lives even extend am reach our families.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.created_time: October 06, 2023, 05:05:28 AMLast edit: October 06, 2023, 05:16:07 AM by Samlucky O
comments.body: Wetting you yan na true. No body is an island of knowledge. No body wey no dey make mistake, we dey try our Best to make sure say the place dey interesting. Wetting we expect when our oga them wey soppos make this place lively dey go other places dey go post. leaving the LB for newbie. People wey supposed to moderate the room no dey, wetting you expect?Morover to create meaningful topic no dey easy the way you see am. out of %100 Post only %20 percent fit be better topic. And you say people dey always repeat topic. Yes because people no dey check previous pages, so when dem check the first page Dem no see wetting Dem wan talk, dem go post am not knowing say e dey previous pages.People wey be legendary today know all this things because them been dey this stage before. The only way e fit work na if den put restrictions for new members to create thread. apart from that, e no go easy because newbie dey flood the forum everyday. If you tell this our set today, wetting you go tell another set wey dey come board tomorow, you go tire! Maybe na this kind thing wey make our oga Dem no dey talk again for we local board again.
